TopicTitle: Attempted to put a station core into orbit of kerbin... she spins and she spins.

Articles.Content: It will not sit still,  just slowly keeps spinning faster and faster at 190,000 meters up.  also AP and PE are fluctuating continuously by +- 100 meters
If you have a joystick installed, make sure that it is zeroed and calibrated.

i had to disable all my joystick inputs couldn't get the game to accept any commands from it 

AH I have an idea.  Its probe controlled... Its possible the controls are gettign stuck full lock right/ left as i'm going out of comm range?
SO i rebuilt with a Kerbal onboard... With it manned station holds steady.  Even if I attemt to EVA, instantly spinning.  Guess Bob is on station SAS control for now
